text: Group B of the 2018 FIFA World Cup took place from 15 to 25 June 2018. The group consisted of Portugal, Spain, Morocco, and Iran. The top two teams advanced to the round of 16. ==Teams== Draw position Team Pot Confederation Method of qualification Date of qualification Finals appearance Last appearance Previous best performance 2017 5th 1998 Round of 16 (1986) 48 B4 3 AFC AFC Third Round Group A winners 12 June 2017 5th 2014 Group stage (1978, 1998, 2006, 2014) 34 ;Notes ==Standings== In the round of 16: * The winners of Group B will advance to play the runners-up of Group A. * The runners-up of Group B will advance to play the winners of Group A. ==Matches== All times listed are local time. ===Morocco vs Iran=== The two teams have never met before. {| style="font- size:90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" GK 12 Munir Mohamedi CB 2 Achraf Hakimi CB 5 Medhi Benatia (c) CB 6 Romain Saïss RM 14 Mbark Boussoufa CM 7 1–0. {| style="font-size:90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" GK 1 Rui Patrício RB 21 Cédric CB 3 Pepe CB 6 José Fonte LB 5 Raphaël Guerreiro CM 14 William Carvalho CM 8 João Moutinho RW 11 Bernardo
